channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canopy Growth’s drop in adult-use pot sales snuffs out cannabis-stock momentum
item.description: Canopy’s stock reversed on earnings after seeing a rally sparked by the possibility of marijuana reform in the U.S.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Trump hits pause on blocking a trade loophole. Temu parent’s stock gains.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Frontier Air’s stock rallies as its rosier outlook, new routes wow Wall Street
item.description: Frontier plans an expansion to cities such as Reno, Nev.; and Tuscan, Ariz.

item.title: Trump, and home buyers, could get their wish for lower mortgage rates — if markets cooperate
item.description: The president’s focus on the 10-year Treasury yield is part of Trump’s efforts to bring down mortgage rates, a promise during his campaign.
